Name: Cheaple Jumpscare
UserPrompt: 1 second of male cheaple (models/humans/male/group01/male_cheaple_sheet) face texture (lower bottom right quadrant of that texture) fullscreen and play stalker scream sound (npc/stalker/go_alert2.wav)
ExecutionCode:
RunOnClient([=[
    surface.CreateFont("JumpscareDummy", {font = "Arial", size = 1})
    
    local jumpscarePanel = vgui.Create("DPanel")
    jumpscarePanel:SetSize(ScrW(), ScrH())
    jumpscarePanel:SetPos(0, 0)
    jumpscarePanel:SetZPos(32767)
    
    local matPath = "models/humans/male/group01/male_cheaple_sheet"
    local mat = Material(matPath)
    
    jumpscarePanel.Paint = function(self, w, h)
        surface.SetDrawColor(0, 0, 0, 255)
        surface.DrawRect(0, 0, w, h)
        
        surface.SetMaterial(mat)
        surface.SetDrawColor(255, 255, 255, 255)
        
        local texW = mat:GetTexture("$basetexture"):Width()
        local texH = mat:GetTexture("$basetexture"):Height()
        
        local u0, v0 = 0.5, 0.5
        local u1, v1 = 1.0, 1.0
        
        local quadSize = math.max(w, h) * 1.2
        local startX = (w - quadSize) / 2
        local startY = (h - quadSize) / 2
        
        surface.DrawTexturedRectUV(startX, startY, quadSize, quadSize, u0, v0, u1, v1)
    end
    
    surface.PlaySound("npc/stalker/go_alert2.wav")
    
    timer.Simple(1, function()
        if IsValid(jumpscarePanel) then
            jumpscarePanel:Remove()
        end
    end)
]=])
UndoCode:
RunOnClient([=[
    for _, panel in pairs(vgui.GetAll()) do
        if IsValid(panel) and panel:GetClassName() == "DPanel" and panel:GetZPos() == 32767 then
            panel:Remove()
        end
    end
]=])
